mapper.select: SELECT b.*, NVL(l.likecount, 0) AS likecount, NVL(r.chatcount, 0) AS chatcount, r.buyer, r.seller FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_num, COUNT(*) AS likecount FROM likes GROUP BY board_num ) l ON b.board_num = l.board_num LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_num, COUNT(*) AS chatcount, LISTAGG(buyer, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY buyer) AS buyer, LISTAGG(seller, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY seller) AS seller FROM room GROUP BY board_num ) r ON b.board_num = r.board_num WHERE b.writer = #{userId} AND b.board_type = #{boardType} ORDER BY b.board_date desc
mapper.update: update board set board_date = sysdate where board_num = #{board_num}
update board set board_status = #{board_status} where board_num = #{board_num}
